abstract: Las Vegas casinos are turning to electronic dance music in a big way, and journalists return to produce a special election edition of a Greek newspaper that hasn’t published since December.
snippet: Las Vegas casinos are turning to electronic dance music in a big way, and journalists return to produce a special election edition of a Greek newspaper that hasn’t published since December.
lead_paragraph: Apple on Monday introduced its own mapping system for iPhones and iPads, which will replace Google’s, in another sign that Apple is distancing itself from a company it once considered a close partner, Brian X. Chen and Nick Wingfield write. The announcement came during a developer conference, and reflects Apple’s efforts to catch up with Google on maps, including acquiring three mapping companies in three years. Also, they write,

headline.main: The Breakfast Meeting: Apple Ditches Google Maps, and You Really Liked ‘Cop and a Half’?
